https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/x541vg9w2p15IWq1N4OQ9jkf1sp.jpg The film is based on A. P. Chekhov’s play “Tatiana Repina” and short story “Difficult People”. At his wedding, the groom is horrified to see among the church crowd his former mistress who had recently committed suicide. Chekhovian Motifs
